messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Missing Posts?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/23/2003 7:42:50 PM Eastern Daylight Time, LOWRIEK@aol.com writes: For a few days I have been missing a few posts here and theree, seeing
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/23/2003 7:42:50 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
LOWRIEK@... writes:
For a few days I have been missing a few posts here and theree, seeing quotes
from posts that I did not get etc.
Anyone else have this happen?
Of course I may never know if you reply as I may miss it !!
Nancy,

This is ALWAYS happening to me! Of course, I'm told it's because I use AOL
for my homeschooling issues (even though my main account is through another
provider; a cable company called RoadRunner).

Tracy

We forfeit three-fouths of ourselves in order to be like other people.

~Arthur Schopenhauer~

> quotes
> from posts that I did not get etc.

Same here....someone quoted (on the government school starting) someone else,
and I couldn't find that post! :o( Bad time for it to happen since so many
are gone!

Nancy B. in WV
